House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02390
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE PROPER COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A CONGRESSIONAL INVESTIGATION ON THE PUBLIC BIDDINGS BEING HELD BY BCDA WHICH INCLUDES THE CLARK AIRPORT RIGGING OF BIDS AS WELL AS OTHER PROJECTS OF VINCE DIZON
